fn.p: Thomas Mattern and Stefan Meyer conceived and designed the experiments, performed the experiments, analyzed the data, contributed reagents/materials/analysis tools, wrote the paper, prepared figures and/or tables, reviewed drafts of the paper.
Ursula Ellenberg, John T. Darby, Yolanda van Heezik, Philip J. Seddon, David M. Houston and Melanie Young contributed reagents/materials/analysis tools, reviewed drafts of the paper.
